name: Brick Love
description: This is a casual game of knocking bricks. There are 4 rounds in each level, and the layout of the bricks will change randomly each round. Knocking a brick may drop props. After obtaining the props, it may strengthen the ability of knocking bricks, or it may be possible weaken. As a reward, each level has a beautiful CG for players to collect. The higher the level, the more exciting it is.
